posts.name: pafwl
posts.cooked:
Unable to build in Android Studio due to message. Could not GET ‘ https://dl.bintray.com/first-tech-challenge/ftcsdk/org/firstinspires/ftc/RobotCore/5.5/RobotCore-5.5.pom ’

Any ideas?

How does android get access to the the

posts.name: Ben Bistline
posts.cooked: I think you might want to reread and reword your question. Currently, I think it’s hard for anyone to help you. Could you possibly provide a full trace back, some more context, and finish that last sentence?

user_custom_fields.user_field_4: Drive it like you stole it

posts.custom_user_title: Drive it like you stole it

posts.name: Joe Ross
posts.cooked: Bintray has been shut down earlier this year. I don’t know anything about FTC, but I’d make sure you’re using the latest version.

posts.name: jwkelly
posts.cooked: I have encountered the same problem. Have you been able to resolve this?

posts.name: Peter Johnson
posts.cooked:
See https://github.com/FIRST-Tech-Challenge/FtcRobotController/issues/148

You need to update to 6.2

posts.name: jwkelly
posts.cooked: Thanks a heap, @Peter_Johnson . I followed the Android Studio Guide from FIRST which pointed me to FtcRobotController 5.x. … will try out 6.x!

posts.name: jwkelly
posts.cooked: Was able to build successfully. Thank you @Peter_Johnson !

posts.name: system
posts.cooked: This topic was automatically closed 365 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
